name: No One Crash - Classic Zigzag
description:
No One Crash is a very classic zigzag game, we develop the original one way game for casual play. Once master it, you can challenge the higher 2 ways or 3 ways. For human 2 and 3 is still playable.

For superman, we provide 4 and 5 ways let you demo your power.
If you are completely mad, you can play 6 ways.
